statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name = 'HIPAA Compliance';
DELETE FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id IN (SELECT requirement_id FROM compliance_records WHERE date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE requirement_id IN (SELECT requirement_id FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE 'GDPR%');
DELETE FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_name LIKE '%ISO%';
DELETE FROM compliance_logs WHERE action = 'Delete' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Obsolete' AND document_url LIKE '%old%';
